amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-815 to add the use of virtual currencies to section 1505 to ensure it is included in the assessment of threat finance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vargas amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Vargas.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Vargas amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
